system.effect: Counts as two void shields, absorbing two attacks from any attacking ship. Once during Opponent's turn, Enginseer Prime can make -10 Tech-Use Check to double Void Shields for that opponent's turn. Doesn't count as Extended Action. If component selected, must be used as Ship's Void Shield.
